    Cred (@CryptoCred)
    #TATip Important point about RSI: After a big move/candle there will almost always be a regular divergence. Don’t use it to try to snipe the bottom or top. Divergences work better when they form during a discernible trend, NOT after a bazooka candle like yesterday.
